page.title: 15Rose Queen Slyne-with-Hest.
page.content: Every year in Slyne-with-Hest there is an event called The Rose Queen in which people from all over come to see people dressed up and the floats that are decorated.In the Rose Queen there are a certain amount of people who dress up and parade around the village for people to watch.There is also a fancy dress competition in which people dress up in different costumes.Also in Slyne-with-Hest Rose Queen there is a competition where groups of people such as the Brownies,Scouts,Playgroup and others take part,and decorate floats, and the judges choose which float is the best and they get a prize. Also in the Slyne-with-Hest Rose Queen there are races and other activities and refreshments. Later on the same day there is a disco and a hot pot supper which many people go to.
